listitem.para: [24-06-2023] magickscience-units now has all his base classes well-finished, near a first official release

sect2.title: Start of scifir libraries
sect2.para: The first years working inside Scifir I've developed the majority of the library, the major events there were:

listitem.para: [29-07-2018] magickscience has been divided in 4 smaller libraries: msci_units, msci_chemistry, msci_geometry, msci_algebra
[08-10-2017] namespace names physics, chemistry, biology, math and informatics replaced by namespace msci
